node.title: Michigan teen faces first-degree murder charges after school shootings
node.alt: Ethan Crumbley appears on a video arraignment at 52nd District Court.
node.description: A 15-year-old boy is charged with murder and terrorism for firing shots that left four fellow students dead and seven others injured at a Michigan high school, authorities say.
node.content:
["A 15-year-old boy has been charged with murder and terrorism for allegedly firing shots\u00a0that left four fellow students dead and seven others injured\u00a0at a Michigan high school, authorities have said.", "A day after the deadly violence at Oxford High School, roughly 50 kilometres north of Detroit, Oakland County authorities offered no motive for the shootings.", "However, prosecutor Karen McDonald said the shootings were\u00a0premeditated, based in part on a \"mountain of digital evidence\" collected by police.", "\"This was not just an impulsive act,\" Ms McDonald said.\u00a0\"It was absolutely premeditated.\"", "Three students hit by gunfire -- Tate Myre, 16, Hanna St. Julian, 14, and Madisyn Baldwin, 17, -- died on Tuesday, the Sheriff's Office said. The fourth, 17-year-old Justin Shilling, died on Wednesday.", "Oakland County Sheriff's Lieutenant\u00a0Tim Willis said during a court hearing for the alleged shooter, Ethan Crumbley, that the boy recorded video the night before the violence in which he discussed shooting and killing students.", "", "
Ethan\u00a0Crumbley, 15, is facing\u00a0charges of murder, attempted murder, terrorism causing death and gun crimes.(AP:\u00a0Paul Sancya)
", "Lieutenant Willis made the comments shortly before the accused shooter\u00a0was to be arraigned on charges of murder, attempted murder, terrorism causing death and gun crimes.", "He was charged as an adult and it wasn't immediately known if he had an attorney who could comment.", "Sheriff Mike Bouchard told reporters that the accused's parents were called to the school on Tuesday \"for behaviour in the classroom that was concerning\".", "The teen remained in school, and the shooting occurred a few hours later.", "Sheriff Bouchard didn't offer details about what had troubled school officials. He said investigators believed the gun was already at the\u00a0school.", "\"There is nothing that he could have faced that would warrant senseless, absolutely brutal violence on other kids,\" the sheriff said.", "The shooting should be a wake-up call for new gun laws in a country that has become \"desensitised to school shootings\", Ms McDonald told reporters.", "\"We have to do better,\" Ms McDonald said, without offering specific changes.", "", "
Parents leave the school with their children\u00a0after the shooting.(Reuters:\u00a0Eric Seals)
", "
Parents could be charged
", "Deputies rushed to the school around lunchtime on Tuesday and arrested Ethan Crumbley in a hallway within minutes of the shooting.", "According to the sheriff, the boy's father had bought the 9mm Sig Sauer gun last week.", "Ms McDonald said charges were being considered against the parents.", "", "
Authorities say\u00a0the\u00a0teen's\u00a0father bought the 9mm Sig Sauer gun last week.(AP:\u00a0Paul Sancya)
", "After the attack, authorities learned of social media posts about threats of a shooting at the roughly 1,700-student school.", "The sheriff stressed how crucial it was for such tips to be sent to authorities, while also cautioning against spreading social media rumours before a full investigation.", "Isabel Flores, a 15-year-old ninth grader, told Detroit television station WJBK that she and other students heard gunshots and saw another student bleeding from the face.", "They then ran from the area through the rear of the school, she said.", "A concerned parent, Robin Redding, said her son, 12th-grader Treshan Bryant, stayed home on Tuesday after hearing threats of a possible shooting.", "\"This couldn't be just random,\" she said.", "Mr Bryant said he had heard vague threats \"for a long time now\" about plans for a shooting.", "At a vigil on Tuesday night at LakePoint Community Church, Leeann Dersa choked back tears as she hugged friends and neighbours.", "", "
Mourners attend a prayer vigil at a church after the shootings on Tuesday.(AP:\u00a0Jake May)
", "Ms Dersa has lived nearly all of her 73 years in Oxford. Her grandchildren attended the high school.", "Pastor Jesse Holt said news of the shootings flooded in to him and his wife, including texts from some of the 20 to 25 students who are among his\u00a0400-member congregation.", "\"Some were very scared, hiding under their desks and texting us, 'We're safe, we're OK. We heard gunshots, but we're OK',\" he said.", "\"They were trying to calm us, at least that's how it felt.\"", "ABC/wires"]
